setting.name: *playerRespawnTime
setting.desc: Player respawn time after dying in milliseconds. Anything below 50 is auto-set to 50

setting.name: *vehicleRespawnTime
setting.desc: Vehicle respawn time after it is taken. Anything below 50 is auto-set to 50

setting.name: *vehicleExpireTime
setting.desc: Vehicle disappear time after abandoned, timer resets if any player re-enters the vehicle. Anything below 50 is auto-set to 50
